text.p: These are the leading stories in the Angolan press on Thursday.
Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- The U.N. special representative to the Great Lakes region, Mohamed Sahnoun, met Angolan President Jose Eduardo dos Santos on Angola's contribution to resolving the crisis in Zaire.
- The Angolan interior ministry said it would take measures to ensure that the border with Zaire would be guarded against entry by illegal foreigners.
- A delegation of Angolan parliamentarians left for Portugal on Wednesday.
